text:
The following Ant task generates HTML files with embedded JS which string literals get broken when there are new line characters in it:

		<junitreport todir="${test.report.dir}">
			<fileset dir="${test.report.dir}">
				<include name="TEST-*.xml"/>
			</fileset>
			<report todir="${test.report.dir}" format="frames"/>
		</junitreport>

A broken string looks as follows:

        cur['line.separator'] = '
';


This does not allow the user to see the JVM properties that were used for running a test.

fixed in 1.8.3 and later - note the current release is 1.9.2
